title: We’re Hiring: Remote Sales Openers - Tax Services
job_overview:
Join a High-Performance Sales Team — From the Comfort of Your Home
We’re a fast-growing, high-performance team in the financial services space.

Our mission? To connect qualified, ready-to-buy prospects with expert closers by using a team of elite openers who know how to bring the energy, handle objections, and spark real interest on every single call.
If you’re hungry, driven, and thrive in a fast-paced sales environment, you’ll fit right in.
________________________________________
What You'll Be Doing

	Take inbound & auto-dialed outbound calls

	Follow our high-converting script to warm up and qualify leads

	Handle questions & objections confidently

	Transfer interested clients to closers, no hard selling!

	Update notes in real time

________________________________________

You’re Perfect for This If You…

	Speak fluent American English with a neutral/light accent

	Sound natural and confident, not robotic

	Have a persuasive tone, great pacing, and strong energy

	Think quick under pressure especially live

	Know how to keep things moving on a call

________________________________________

Tools & Tech You'll Use

	Ytel (or similar to VUpgrade to see actual info, Five9) dialers

Upgrade to see actual info for team communication

	Financial CRMs and scripts

	You should also be comfortable handling credit reports and sensitive financial info

________________________________________
Minimum Setup Requirements

	100 Mbps stable internet (download & upload)

	Latency under 50ms

	Dual monitors (or willing to get one within 2 weeks)

	Quiet, professional WFH environment

________________________________________
Bonus Points If You Have:

	1–3+ years in sales, lead gen, or telemarketing

	Experience in U.S. financial services or loan programs

	Familiarity with credit reports, CRMs, or high-ticket sales

________________________________________

 We can’t wait to hear from you!
